de.japi.components.listeners

Class Japi2KeyListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.japi.components.listeners.AbstractJapi2Listener
      • de.japi.components.listeners.Japi2KeyListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.KeyListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class Japi2KeyListener
extends AbstractJapi2Listener
implements java.awt.event.KeyListener
    JAPI2 wrapper for an KeyListener.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Japi2KeyListener

        public Japi2KeyListener(Japi2Session session)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Constructs a new JAPI2 key listener.

        Important: this constructor already adds this listener to the objects map through Japi2Session.addObject(java.lang.Object).

        Parameters:
        session - the session object to operate on.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs.
